required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics Evaluation of Recombinant Coagulation Factor VIII Injection in Subjects With Hemophilia A.
clinical_study.official_title: Randomized, Open-label, Double Cycle, Crossover, Pharmacokinetics Study of Recombinant Coagulation Factor VIII Injection Versus Xyntha® in Subjects With Hemophilia A.

lead_sponsor.agency: Chia Tai Tianqing Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: Chia Tai Tianqing Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: This is a multi-center, open-label, randomized study. Participants will be assigned to A or B groups with a scale of 1:1 , i.e. infuse study drug followed by Xyntha (group A), or the alternate sequence (group B). All participants who completed the study will enter the Prophylactic Therapy Study.

primary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetic parameters between test preparation and reference preparation, peak plasma concentration (Cmax)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Hour 30min (pre-dose), 5min, 20min, 35min, 60min, 1.5 h, 2h, 3 h, 6 h, 9 h, 24 h, 36 h, 48 h post-dose on single dose in day 1 to day 4.
primary_outcome.description: Cmax is the maximum plasma concentration of Recombinant Coagulation Factor VIII or metabolite(s).

primary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetic parameters between Recombinant Coagulation Factor VIII, Area under the plasma concentration verus time curve(AUC)
primary_outcome.time_frame: Hour 30min (pre-dose), 5min, 20min, 35min, 60min, 1.5 h, 2h, 3 h, 6 h, 9 h, 24 h, 36 h, 48 h post-dose on single dose in day 1 to day 4.
primary_outcome.description: To characterize the pharmacokinetics of Recombinant Coagulation Factor VIII by assessment of area under the plasma concentration time curve from zero to infinity.

primary_outcome.measure: Incremental recovery between test preparation and reference preparation
primary_outcome.description: Peak activity of FVIII (as Cmax) measured within 1 hour after the end of infusion.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Hour 30min (pre-dose), 5min, 20min, 35min, 60min, 1.5 h, 2h, 3 h, 6 h, 9 h, 24 h, 36 h, 48 h post-dose on single dose in day 1 to day 4.
secondary_outcome.description: To characterize the pharmacokinetics of Recombinant Coagulation Factor VIII by assessment of time to reach maximum plasma concentration

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Hour 30min (pre-dose), 5min, 20min, 35min, 60min, 1.5 h, 2h, 3 h, 6 h, 9 h, 24 h, 36 h, 48 h post-dose on multiple dose in day 5 to day 8.
secondary_outcome.description: To characterize the pharmacokinetics of Recombinant Coagulation Factor VIII by assessment of half-life

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Hour 30min (pre-dose), 5min, 20min, 35min, 60min, 1.5 h, 2h, 3 h, 6 h, 9 h, 24 h, 36 h, 48 h post-dose on single dose in day 1 to day 4.
secondary_outcome.description: MRT is the average time that drug molecules stay in the body after a quick intravenous injection.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Hour 30min (pre-dose), 5min, 20min, 35min, 60min, 1.5 h, 2h, 3 h, 6 h, 9 h, 24 h, 36 h, 48 h post-dose on single dose in day 1 to day 4.
secondary_outcome.description: To characterize the pharmacokinetics of Recombinant Coagulation Factor VIII by assessment of terminal rate constant.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Hour 30min (pre-dose), 5min, 20min, 35min, 60min, 1.5 h, 2h, 3 h, 6 h, 9 h, 24 h, 36 h, 48 h post-dose on single dose in day 1 to day 4.
secondary_outcome.description: To characterize the pharmacokinetics of Recombinant Coagulation Factor VIII by assessment of apparent plasma clearance following intravenous injection.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Hour 30min (pre-dose), 5min, 20min, 35min, 60min, 1.5 h, 2h, 3 h, 6 h, 9 h, 24 h, 36 h, 48 h post-dose on single dose in day 1 to day 4.
secondary_outcome.description: To characterize the pharmacokinetics of Recombinant Coagulation Factor VIII by assessment of apparent volume of distribution.

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration verus time curve (AUC)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Hour 30min (pre-dose), 5min, 20min, 35min, 60min, 1.5 h, 2h, 3 h, 6 h, 9 h, 24 h, 36 h, 48 h post-dose on multiple dose in day 5 to day 8.
secondary_outcome.description: To characterize the pharmacokinetics of Recombinant Coagulation Factor VIII by assessment of area under the plasma concentration time curve from zero to infinity.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Hour 30min (pre-dose), 5min, 20min, 35min, 60min, 1.5 h, 2h, 3 h, 6 h, 9 h, 24 h, 36 h, 48 h post-dose on multiple dose in day 5 to day 8.
secondary_outcome.description: To characterize the pharmacokinetics of Recombinant Coagulation Factor VIII by assessment of maximum plasma concentration.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: On the 176th day after the prevention of medication
secondary_outcome.description: To characterize the pharmacokinetics of Recombinant Coagulation Factor VIII by assessment of time to reach maximum plasma concentration.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: On the 176th day after the prevention of medication

arm_group.description: Participants will be assigned to group A or B with a scale of 1:1 , i.e. infuse reference drug Xyntha (group A), then experimental drug (group B). All participants who completed the study will enter the prophylaxis group study.

Participants will be assigned to group A or B with a scale of 1:1 , i.e. infuse experimental drug (group B), then reference drug Xyntha (group A). All participants who completed the study will enter the prophylaxis group study.

intervention.description: Recombinant Coagulation Factor VIII Injection produced by Pfizer Inc.
A kind of Recombinant Coagulation Factor VIII Injection produced by sponsor.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Hemophilia A.
2. FVIII:C <1%. 3）12 and 65 years old.
4）Has received FVIII treatment and the treatment exposure days ≥100. 5）Has bleeding treatment records of at least 3 months before randomization. 6）FVIII inhibitor assay results is negative.
7） Subjects should agree to use an adequate method of contraception during the study.
8）Understood and Signed an informed consent form. 9）Has not received an treatment of any FVIII within 4 days before the first dose.
10）Non-bleeding state.
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Has a history or family history of blood coagulation factor VIII inhibitor.
2. Has other coagulation dysfunction diseases in addition to hemophilia A.
3. HIV positive.
4. Plan to receive surgery during the trial.
5. Has used immunomodulator within one weeks before the first dose，and less than 7 half-life periods.
6. Known to be allergic to experimental drugs or any excipients.
7. Severe anemia and need blood transfusion.
8. Serious liver or kidney damage.
9. Serious heart disease.
10. Uncontrollable hypertension.
11. Has participated in other clinical studies within one month before the first dose.
12. The researchers believe that it is not suitable for participants.

facility.name: The First Hospital of LanZhou University
Hematology and Blood Diseases Hospital, Chinese Academy of Medical Sciences
